body_html:
Thanks @jbarker-nvidia !

Actually I think the code works (tests were passing a couple of days ago).
Today I checked back and noticed a failure on onnx-fb-universe plus a conflict on a file. I solved the latter, and now I'm seeing pr/pytorch-win-ws2016-cuda9-cudnn7-py3 failing. Apparently failures are unrelated though (see https://ci.pytorch.org/jenkins/job/pytorch-builds/job/pytorch-win-ws2016-cuda9-cudnn7-py3-test/1131/console).

It would really be great if you could take a look at the PR and see if there's anything fishy. Thanks!

body:
Thanks @jbarker-nvidia !

Actually I think the code works (tests were passing a couple of days ago).
Today I checked back and noticed a failure on `onnx-fb-universe` plus a conflict on a file. I solved the latter, and now I'm seeing `pr/pytorch-win-ws2016-cuda9-cudnn7-py3` failing. Apparently failures are unrelated though (see https://ci.pytorch.org/jenkins/job/pytorch-builds/job/pytorch-win-ws2016-cuda9-cudnn7-py3-test/1131/console).

It would really be great if you could take a look at the PR and see if there's anything fishy. Thanks!
